ovdesc.p: This file is updated during simulations when there are any simulated bills updated between the current system date and the simulation end date.
This is only used for enquiry purposes to produce the schedule details for a simulated Arrangement contract.

desc.p: This field represents the payment date when the associated payment types are due.
This field represents the total payment amount for the payment type on the payment date. This is the sum of all property amounts for the payment type.
This field represents the payment type. The payment type defined in the payment schedule property for the given payment date.
This field represents the method of payment. It denotes whether the payment needs to be made due or capitalised or for information only.
This field denotes the arrangement id for which the bill is generated
This field denotes the outstanding balance for CUR Account property as on the Payment date.
This field represents the total payment amount on the payment date. This is the sum of all property amounts for all Payment types for the payment date.
